name: Tesla Model 3
description: Electric sedan with Autopilot capabilities, impressive range, and cutting-edge technology. Features a minimalist interior with a 15-inch touchscreen display and over-the-air updates.

name: BMW i4 M50
description: High-performance electric sedan with BMW's signature driving dynamics. Features a 536-horsepower dual-motor setup, 300-mile range, and luxurious interior with the latest iDrive system.

name: Mercedes-Benz E-Class
description: Luxury sedan combining elegance with advanced technology. Features MBUX infotainment system, driver assistance features, and a choice of powerful engines including hybrid options.

name: Audi A6
description: Premium executive sedan with quattro all-wheel drive, virtual cockpit, and sophisticated design. Features advanced driver assistance systems and a refined interior with premium materials.

name: Porsche Taycan
description: All-electric sports sedan with exceptional performance and Porsche's legendary driving dynamics. Features up to 750 horsepower, 800-volt architecture for fast charging, and track-ready capabilities.

name: Ford Mustang Mach-E
description: All-electric SUV with Mustang heritage and impressive performance. Features extended range battery options, BlueCruise hands-free driving, and a spacious interior with modern technology.

name: Toyota Camry Hybrid
description: Reliable and fuel-efficient sedan with hybrid powertrain. Features Toyota Safety Sense 2.5+, comfortable interior, and excellent fuel economy. Perfect for daily commuting and long trips.

name: Honda Accord Hybrid
description: Spacious and efficient sedan with Honda's advanced hybrid system. Features Honda Sensing safety suite, premium interior, and excellent reliability. Great value for a midsize sedan.
